place.name: CWMBACH LLECHRYD
place.gazetteerText: Llechryd Junction, ry. sta., on W. border of Radnor, 2 m. NW. of Builth Wells sta. and 9 SE. of Rhayader. (In 1887, John Bartholomew's Gazetteer of the British Isles)
